Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 678 Weeds and Litter

678.01Noxious weeds prohibited. 678.02Heights limitations and prohibited areas of growth. 678.03Cutting periods. 678.04Litter; declaration of nuisance; exceptions. 678.05Litter defined. 678.06Inspections; order to abate. 678.07Service of notice. 678.08Recovery of costs. 678.09Abatement by Municipality. 678.10Nonpayment of bills.

CROSS REFERENCES

Weeds - see Ohio R.C. 731.51 et seq.

Injuring vegetation - see GEN. OFF. 642.06

Littering - see GEN. OFF. 660.03

Trees and shrubs generally - see S.U. & P.S. Ch. 1282

Hedges - see P. & Z. 1270.47
